entry.title: President Tuyết's New Year speech
entry.content:
MSRA President Tuyết's 2022 New Year's speech - Youtube

My fellow citizens!
We are proud to usher in a new and hopeful 2022.
The past 2021 is the first year since the establishment of the Republic of Amazonia. The Republic of Amazonia has achieved quite a few incredible achievements. We have launched a more beautiful national flag and national emblem, and we have signed the Republic of Amazonia Declaration of Independence, declaring to the world that we are an independent and sovereign state. The Republic of Amazonia has conquered a new territory in Attica, which has a long history, picturesque, and rich products, the Nea Emesa Metropolis, this lead us also join the big family of terran micronations. These achievements have made the Republic of Amazonia shine in the micronational world, and let the kindness, tolerance, and hospitality of the Amazonian people be widely known.
Although in 2021, the COVID-19 is still raging around the world, and the pandemic has caused various inconveniences to the lives of compatriots and me, but the Republic of Amazonia has never been defeated by these difficulties. We are still in brilliant achievements have been made this year. I would like to thank my compatriots who have faced difficulties side by side, helped each other, and built the country together, and I would like to extend my sincere tribute to and all medical workers of Amazonia and all over the world who have tried their best to fight against the pandemic.
This year, the new constitution of the Republic of Amazonia will be implemented to ensure that we have always protected basic human rights, empowered the people to participate in and discussed politics, and established more efficient government agencies, the Secretariate and the Censorate. The Republic of Amazonia will develop friendly and cooperative relations with all diplomatic countries and make active efforts to achieve lasting world peace.
In the new year, I hope that we will work together and walk hand in hand, with the desire and determination to build an increasingly strong and prosperous micronation, with our unity, innovation, and enterprising will and ability, we will advance courageously in the renovations.
I wish the people of Amazonia all over the country can realize their wishes, and I wish every Amazonian person be healthy and happy, and be in a beautiful mood every day of the coming year!
Happy New Year! Auld Lang Syne!

entry.title: 3 commemorative NFTs issued for Amazonia's first anniversary
entry.content:
Happy 1st independence day!
The Most Serene Republic of Amazonia was formed on 28 December 2020, It's been a whole year till now. The President Her Serene Highness Vân Tinh Nghiên Tuyết issued 3 commemorative NFTs on Rinkeby test network, to mark this wonderful event.
The President said that this is the first time that MSRA has released NFTs. Although it is not large in scale, it is a good start. In the future, the MSRA government will make more NFTs for everyone to collect.

entry.title: MSRA occupied the Nea Emesa Prefecture
entry.content:
MSRA conquered a territory by night assault in Chalandri tonight, the occupied territory named Nea Emesa, this name is from the ancient Greek city Emesa (nowaday known as Homs in Syria).
President Vân Tinh Nghiên Tuyết led this assault, since there were no Imvrassia soldiers guarding there, Amazonia occupied the territory very easily. after the assault, she annunced the formation of the Nea Emesa Prefecture.
Tuyết designed and posted the flag and coat of arms of Nea Emesa prefecture in the official discord server of Amazonia.

entry.title: The President created Amazonian Academy and awarded 6 honorary members
entry.content:
On the morning of 27 November, the President Vân Tinh Nghiên Tuyết signed an executive order, formed a national academy that similar to Académie française, the Amazonian Academy.
In the executive order, the president also awarded 6 people Fellowship of the Amazonian Academy, all members of the Amazonian Academy can use the post-nominal letters FAA (Fellow of the Amazonian Academy).

Here is the text of the executive order:

Executive order 2021.a8
To support research in the humanities and natural sciences, the Amazonian Academy is now established.
Fellowships will be awarded by the President by executive order.
And now, I hereby award Fellowship of the Amazonian Academy (FAA) to these respectable people for their profound knowledge and noble character:
HIM Jonathan I, Emperor of Austenasia
Su Yi-an, Leader of Eastasia
Connie Sarah, Leader of Caelesta
HSH Vân Tinh Nghiên Tuyết, President of Amazonia
Hilja-Sinikka Iltanen
Triệu giản nghi

Vân Tinh Nghiên Tuyết
27/11/2021

entry.title: Amazonia signed the Wrythe Convention
entry.content: On 27 October 2021, the President signed the Wrythe Convention in Athens, Greece on behalf of the Amazonian government. it's an important intermicronational convention, concluded and opened for signature on 15 September 2018. it condemns sockpuppeting, identity theft, and false claims within micronationalism.

entry.title: Amazonia signed and passed the Supplementary Convention on the Abolition of Slavery

entry.title: 新法定货币：萨塔玛纳简介
entry.content:
国家储备系统将发行萨塔玛纳（Satamana）作为阿玛宗的法定货币，名称来源于犍陀罗王国流通货币शतमान（转写：satamana），原意为“一百个Māna[1]”。符号为𝕊。辅币单位玛纳特（Manat）面值为0.01萨塔玛纳，即100个玛纳特换一个萨塔玛纳，名称来源于俄文词汇“монета”（转写：moneta），原意为硬币。此外“马纳特”还是土库曼斯坦和阿塞拜疆的流通货币的名称。

  1. 古印度重量单位 ↩︎
